item.title: [DISTRELEC-3554] Add to compare list not working for specific user
item.description:
on HP-Q, log in with user office@ilee.ch / 123456
(note: this is a user with many shopping lists who could not log in, resolved by DISTRELEC-3486)

-> add any item to the compare list
-> no "+1" appears, no compare list menu item appears

For anonymous users and other logged in users, also ones with even more shopping lists, the compare functionality works fine.
item.summary: Add to compare list not working for specific user

comments.comment:
Checked the HMC:
this user has dozens of compare list.

What could possibly be related:

  • from a shopping list with around 30 products, I did a bulk-add-to-compare-list action. This action did not work either, though.
Same user also has a great number of compare lists on P, so probably not related to any of my test activities.
The user should only have one compare list. the system can't handle users with more than one compare list

Flexible Search for finding users with more than one compare list

SELECT

{w.user}, count FROM {Wishlist2 as w JOIN NamicsWishlistType as nwt ON {nwt.pk} = {w.listtype}} WHERE {nwt.code} LIKE 'COMPARE' GROUP BY {w.user}

HAVING count > 1

Bean Shell for deleting unnecessary compare lists

import de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.search.FlexibleSearchQuery;
import com.namics.hybris.toolbox.spring.SpringUtil;
import com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.enums.NamicsWishlistType;

modelService = SpringUtil.getBean("modelService");
flexibleSearchService = SpringUtil.getBean("flexibleSearchService");

FlexibleSearchQuery query = new FlexibleSearchQuery("SELECT

{w.user}FROM {Wishlist2 as w JOIN NamicsWishlistType as nwt ON {nwt.pk} = {w.listtype}} WHERE {nwt.code} LIKE 'COMPARE' GROUP BY {w.user}

HAVING count > 1");
result = flexibleSearchService.search(query);
users = result.getResult();

for (u : users){
print("user: " + u.getUid());
int i = 0;
int deleted = 0;
for (w : u.getWishlist()) {
if (w.getListType() == NamicsWishlistType.COMPARE) {
i++;
if (i > 1)

{ modelService.remove(w); deleted++; }

}
}
print(" > deleted " + deleted + " of " + i + " compare list(s)");
}
print("script finished");

Resolved for now;
should be checked again after March 31 to verify assess whether it is a migration or a current shop issue.

Nabil,
please check again for this occurence (see above comments / query) around 10. April.
If no faulty lists are found, you can resolve this ticket. Otherwise the source of them needs to be analyzed.

On P system, I found only one customer (ID = piusi) with multiple compare lists.
On Q system, no customer found.
On P System, I found 3 customers with multiple compare lists.

Ok apparently there is a bug somewhere creating the additional lists.

  • Nabil, can you please periodically check for multiple lists and clean up the respective customers (every few weeks)
  • Analysis of bug to be done later as it is relatively low prio.
I did it until now. I will update you soon.

Here is the last status:

  • caratti.p@bluewin.ch ==> 53 compare lists
  • galatialan@hotmail.ch ==> 96 compare lists
  • g.loriano@libero.it ==> 107 compare lists
  • vendite@tecnodelta.trieste.it ==> 73 compare lists

Clean up already done.
Linked to DISTRELEC-4058
If a customer has more than one shopping list, we merge all lists in one and delete all other lists and entries.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4138] Order Confirmation Email // Sent form Hybris & SAP
item.description:
If an generation of an order-number is delayed from SAP(runs into timeout on confirmation-page) then an order-confirmation is sent from Hybris including Hybris order-number). A little later another email is sent from SAP with the SAP-order-number.

In this case the Hybris process to send out a confirmation-email should not run..
item.summary: Order Confirmation Email // Sent form Hybris & SAP

Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4109] CMS Cockpit: Internal Link dialog is missing "name" field -> creation not possible
item.description:
The dialog to create an internal link is missing a mandatory field: "Name" (not the same as "Linkname").
Therefore an internal Link cannot be created.

(e.g. on a rotating teaser image, a carpet teaser image, etc.)

Workaround through HMC is used by CMS team.

See screenshot.
item.summary: CMS Cockpit: Internal Link dialog is missing "name" field -> creation not possible

comments.comment: The configuration on the test system was not up-to-date, but the last modified date says something else. However, I have updated the config and now its fine.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4108] IF-09 ReadShippingMethod - service must return only the available shipping methods
item.description:
The business decision is to show for all the customer the following shipping methods specific for country:

1- Lithuania

  • Collection (Pick Up - Goods available in shop stock can be picked up from store 3 hours after order placement)
  • Economy to door (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec within 3 days)
  • Normal to door (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec the same day)
  • Express (Contact our Customer Service)

2- Sweden

  • Collection (Goods available in shop stock can be picked up from store 3 hours after order placement)
  • Economy to door (39.00 SEK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec within 3 days)
  • Economy to pick up p (39.00 SEK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec within 3 days)
  • Normal to door (85.00 SEK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec the same day)
  • Normal to pick up p (85.00 SEK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec the same day)
  • Express (Contact our Customer Service)

3- Denmark

  • Economy to door (50.00 DKK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec within 3 days)
  • Economy to pick up p (50.00DKK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec within 3 days)
  • Normal to door (85.00 DKK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec the same day)
  • Normal to pick up p (85.00 DKK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec the same day)
  • Express (Contact our Customer Service)

4- Norway

  • Economy to door (60.00 DKK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec within 3 days)
  • Economy to pick up p (60.00DKK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec within 3 days)
  • Normal to door (90.00 DKK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec the same day)
  • Normal to pick up p (90.00 DKK) (Order normally leaves Elfa Distrelec the same day)
  • Express (Contact our Customer Service)

Could you please take care of the configuration in SAP?
item.summary: IF-09 ReadShippingMethod - service must return only the available shipping methods

comments.comment: That has been done. Is there any issue?

This is what we receive:

<shippingMethods>
	<shippingMethodCode>A1</shippingMethodCode>
	<default>false</default>
</shippingMethods>
<shippingMethods>
	<shippingMethodCode>E2</shippingMethodCode>
	<default>false</default>
</shippingMethods>
<shippingMethods>
	<shippingMethodCode>X1</shippingMethodCode>
	<default>true</default>
</shippingMethods>
<shippingMethods>
	<shippingMethodCode>N1</shippingMethodCode>
	<default>false</default>
</shippingMethods>

Is it correct?

If yes i think we need to review the mapping between the SAP code and the hybris code
can you try again? The transport was not transferred to Q.
Seems correct now, but the mapping needs to be updated. Created seperate ticket for that: DISTRELEC-4143

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4096] LT: Hide "send to different address" option if user has no delivery address
item.description:
Concerns checkout step 1 FOR THE CASE THAT EDITING/ADDING OF ADDRESSES IS DISABLED:

  • if the user does not have a shipping address (which in this case could only be added through the backoffice / SAP), the second radio box "Pristatyti mano užsakymą kitu adresu" / "Deliver my order to a different address" should not be visible and selectable. -> only the first option and the pickup option should be visible.
item.summary: LT: Hide "send to different address" option if user has no delivery address

comments.comment:
Done.

We will NOT display this option if the erp is not movex and the customer is a b2b and his has no shippingAddresses.
I have test with CH b2c/b2b and LT b2c/b2b + b2b with shipping addresses.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4070] LT - click on order manager ends in an 500 error
item.description:
Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041
TS-24.02

https://test.distrelec.lt/my-account/login-data#OrderManager

Log in as distrelec.testing+lt99@gmail.com, pw distrelec. Click on order manager in C14 metanav will ends in an 500 error. Also when try in user settings change to order management. (img_81-83_pzu_lt)
item.summary: LT - click on order manager ends in an 500 error

comments.comment:
Hi

Can not be reproduced on my local machine. I will check again after the deployment.

Hello Neeraj

If we are looking for the order history of a new B2C customer (order history empty) we will have a null pointer exception.
The method SapOrderService.searchOrders return null. In SapOrderHistoryFacade we are doing a .getOrders() on the return (null).

Can you make the change needed please?

Regards,

Laurent

Hi Laurent,

Fix has been applied. Please take an update and run the lated code to verfy the fix.

If you find it working the mark as resolve.

Thanks

Even without the fix at the moment the problem doesn't occur.
I'll set it as resolved, will be tested after the deployment.

Hello Nano

This problem occur only for a b2c customer without order. It occur on test with the actual version
It's working locally.

Thank you

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4058] Exception in compare list
item.description:
On HP Q system (node 2) a lot of these exceptions are thrown and logged in console.log.

Caused by: de.hybris.platform.util.jeeapi.YNoSuchEntityException: Entity not found ( pk = 8810617701054 name = 'de.hybris.platform.persistence.wishlist_Wishlist2Entry' type code = '702' db table = 'wishlist2entry')
at de.hybris.platform.persistence.GenericBMPBean.loadData(GenericBMPBean.java:258)
at de.hybris.platform.persistence.GenericBMPBean.ejbLoad(GenericBMPBean.java:147)
at de.hybris.platform.persistence.framework.RemoteInvocationHandler.performOther(RemoteInvocationHandler.java:187)
at de.hybris.platform.persistence.framework.RemoteInvocationHandler.invoke(RemoteInvocationHandler.java:107)
at com.sun.proxy.$Proxy89.getPropertyRaw(Unknown Source)
at de.hybris.platform.persistence.ExtensibleItemEJBImpl.getProperty(ExtensibleItemEJBImpl.java:101)
at de.hybris.platform.jalo.ExtensibleItem$2.compute(ExtensibleItem.java:353)
at de.hybris.platform.jalo.Item$CachedGetter.get(Item.java:677)
at de.hybris.platform.jalo.ExtensibleItem.getProperty(ExtensibleItem.java:355)
at de.hybris.platform.wishlist2.jalo.GeneratedWishlist2Entry.getWishlist(GeneratedWishlist2Entry.java:359)

at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
at de.hybris.platform.jalo.type.ReflectionAttributeAccess$AttributeMethod.invokeGetter(ReflectionAttributeAccess.java:742)
at de.hybris.platform.jalo.type.ReflectionAttributeAccess.getValue(ReflectionAttributeAccess.java:925)
at de.hybris.platform.jalo.Item.getAttribute(Item.java:1813)
at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.converter.impl.ItemModelConverter.readSingleAttribute(ItemModelConverter.java:1009)
at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.converter.impl.ItemAttributeProvider.getAttribute(ItemAttributeProvider.java:86)
at de.hybris.platform.wishlist2.model.Wishlist2EntryModel.getWishlist(Wishlist2EntryModel.java:329)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.wishlist.converter.NamicsWishlistEntryConverter.populate(NamicsWishlistEntryConverter.java:77)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.wishlist.converter.NamicsWishlistEntryConverter.populate(NamicsWishlistEntryConverter.java:1)
at de.hybris.platform.commerceservices.converter.impl.AbstractConverter.convert(AbstractConverter.java:41)
at de.hybris.platform.commerceservices.converter.impl.AbstractConverter.convert(AbstractConverter.java:35)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.wishlist.converter.NamicsWishlistConverter.convertEntry(NamicsWishlistConverter.java:103)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.wishlist.converter.NamicsWishlistConverter.convertEntries(NamicsWishlistConverter.java:88)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.wishlist.converter.NamicsWishlistConverter.populate(NamicsWishlistConverter.java:49)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.wishlist.converter.NamicsWishlistConverter.populate(NamicsWishlistConverter.java:1)
at de.hybris.platform.commerceservices.converter.impl.AbstractConverter.convert(AbstractConverter.java:41)
at de.hybris.platform.commerceservices.converter.impl.AbstractConverter.convert(AbstractConverter.java:35)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.wishlist.impl.AbstractDistWishlistFacade.convertWishlist(AbstractDistWishlistFacade.java:81)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.wishlist.impl.DefaultNamicsGenericWishlistFacade.getWishlist(DefaultNamicsGenericWishlistFacade.java:47)

at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.AbstractPageController.getCompareListSize(AbstractPageController.java:579)

Which could be the problem?
item.summary: Exception in compare list

comments.comment: If a customer has more than one shopping list, we merge all lists in one and delete all other lists and entries.
Did you mean compare list? What exactly is the issue that a customer can have more than one compare lists?

Hi

A comparelist is a wishlist (for hybris). If a customer had more than one compare list, we create a new one but this solution will never resolve the issue and the customer can no access to his wishlist (see DISTRELEC-3554).

This issue is only possible with performance tests because we are trying to access to an existing list but during the conversion (model to data) we removed the list with all entries. The conversion can not be finished and will crash. We have also modified the tests scripts.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4039] Cannot generate your order confirmation number
item.description:
I tried to create an order.

Order Confirmation was received.

On thank you page I did not receive the Order Confirmation Number. Please see attached
item.summary: Cannot generate your order confirmation number

comments.comment: sorry. I meant to create a Bug, not a Task.

No problem, the ticket type can be changed.

Seems to be different from the initial problem we had with this number (DISTRELEC-3972), where the "generating number" info stayed endlessly. Now it eventually gets replaced with an error.

So why do we not get an order number from SAP?

Hi Erik
could you please have a look to this issue?

Hi Francesco,

The back end returns a malformatted json reply:

"{\"status\":\"ok\",\"erpCode\":\"0073634483\"}"

Should be

{"status":"ok","erpCode":"0073634483"}

i.e. w/o enclosing quotes, and non-escaped quotes inside.

Hi Erik
i've fixed on the javascript side the deserialization of the json into a js object with the following line in success block:

jsonData=$.parseJSON(data);

The page now is not showing an error, but the Hybris Order code is shown instead the ERP code.

Could you please have a look on that?

Hi Erik,

Raphael asked me to review your Changes..so I will assign this ticket to me.
Regards Jan
review is done. Can be tested after next deployment.

LT webshop
Date input in date filtering on order history page is not ok.
See attachments
item.summary: LT - date filtering in order history

comments.comment:
Done.

The date format is now used (text.store.dateformat).
I have changed the space between the calendar icon and the text input box border to have more place.
I have changed all fmt:formatDate with type="date" to use the same pattern (based on text.store.dateformat property).
Not correct. See attached file on 20/05

Hello Jean-Wilfrid

Can you try again please? The new property is below.

text.store.dateformat.datepicker.selection = yy-mm-dd

Regards,

Laurent

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3999] Translation of navigation for DK / LT / NO / SE
item.description:
Please fill in the navigation labels for the following languages

  • da
  • lt
  • no
  • sv
item.summary: Translation of navigation for DK / LT / NO / SE

comments.comment: @David: As discussed yesterday...
Hallo Patrick, bitte komme auf mich zu.
Done, File attached: CategoryTree_NavigationNodes-Transformation - Translated.xlsm

Hi Raphi
Could you please import?
Thx

@Florian: Navigation is translated and will be part of v2.0.1. However, there is a problem with the length of the 1st level menu items. They are too long in..

  • da => to be reduced by 5 characters
  • lt => to be reduced by 7 characters
  • no => to be reduced by 5 characters
  • se => to be reduced by 2 characters
    and therefore the item "Computing & Hobby" is not visible!

David,
Could you please clarify this with the CMs?
We need shorter names like in Italy for Computing & Hobby.
Hi Samuel, Can you please check the Options with the countries. Thanks.

Hello Adrian,

What is the max char for each field?

Thanks

There is no general number of characters, as it depends on the letters used. 'm' is wider than 'l', so the actual number of characters varies.
In the front end texts are typically cut off based on a pixel width.
There is no max width for the individual main nav items, but just a max total width for all of them.
In this specific case the best way is trial and error.

Hi Nando,

It seems like Oana has taken care of the LIT. I will deal with the Nordic countries.

Take care

@Samuel: Just detected that even DE has a problem (see http://test.distrelec.ch/?lang=de)
The current live version uses "Netzteile & Licht" but in the new import (attached Excel) we received "Stromversorgung & Licht". As a result the sum of all 1st level texts are too long and the last element will not be displayed anymore.

This has to be named: "Netzteile & Licht".
Samuel, please change this.
Patrick Zubler should add the corrected file to the ticket and assign it to Raphi Husi.
Done

Hi Raphael

Please import again, there was made some additional changes.

BR, Patrick
Imported on Q

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3867] Browser-Caching nutzen
item.description:
Browser-Caching nutzen
Das Festlegen eines Ablaufdatums oder eines Höchstalters in den HTTP-Headern für statische Ressourcen weist den Browser an, zuvor heruntergeladene Ressourcen über die lokale Festplatte anstatt über das Netzwerk zu laden.

Nutzen Sie Browser-Caching für die folgenden cachefähigen Ressourcen:

http://www.distrelec.ch/…mages/landscape_medium/27/4f/950274f.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…ape_medium/59/8f/microsoft-269-16150.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…_e/ps/crealogix-g75_wv-7640110955123.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…cape_medium/_t/if/multi-contact-ls-4.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…f/profilgehause-clamshell-alustyle-6.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…turer_logo/54/08/raspberry_logo_cmyk.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…turer_logo/_e/ps/crealogix_logo_cmyk.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…cturer_logo/_t/if/ebmpapst_logo_cmyk.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…rer_logo/_t/if/microsoft_logo_bitmap.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…r_logo/_t/if/multi_contact_logo_cmyk.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base-head.min.js (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base-one.min.css (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base-two.min.css (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base.min.js (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…all/cache/dyn-jquery-caroufredsel.min.js (Ablaufdatum nicht
item.summary: Browser-Caching nutzen

comments.comment:
CMS Bilder

Ablaufdatum kann auf unendlich gesetzt werden,
da neue Bilder einen neuen Key bekommen.

-> Aufwand für die Apache config ca. 2h

PIM/Produkt Bilder

Ablaufdatum muss von Distrelec definiert werden.

-> Aufwand für die Apache config ca. 2h

CSS / JavaScript

Damit wir das Ablaufdatum möglichst hoch machen können müssen wir beim Deployment einen Key generieren und ihn als parameter an die CSS-/JS- Dateien anhängen.

Dann können wir das Ablaufdatum auf unendlich einstellen und haben trotzdem nach jedem Deployment sofrt die neusten Files.

-> Aufwand für (generieren, anpassen im Template, Apache config) ca. 10h

@Florian

  • Bitte Ablaufdatum für Bilder vom PIM definieren.
  • Bitte weiteres Vorgehen festlegen.

René,
could you please start with this task.

Can we quickly talk about the expire date?

Einstellungen:

  • default -> 1 Woche
  • PIM-Bilder -> 1 Woche
  • CSS/JS (base*) -> 1 Jahr (sie bekommen neu bei jedem Deployment einen neuen GET-Parameter und werden dann sofort neu geladen)
  • /media -> 1 Jahr (neue Media bekommen immer auch einen neuen Key)

<Location /Web>
ExpiresDefault "access plus 1 month"
</Location>

<Location /_ui/all/cache/>
ExpiresDefault "access plus 1 year"
</Location>

<Location /media>
ExpiresDefault "access plus 1 year"
</Location>
done

Once the page loaded into the browser cache, we have very few requests left (Homepage: 46 before, 8 now). Excellent!!! (see screenshot.png)

However, there are two bad guys left:
http://test.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/media/favicon.ico
http://test.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/media/sprites.png?......

They reside in /_ui/all/media/ that does not get a future expires header.
Can you try to eliminate them, too?

<Location /_ui/all/media>
ExpiresDefault "access plus 1 week"
</Location>

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3147] Vergleich form - keine gemeinsamen Attribute
item.description:
3 items are compared.
919901, 600323 and 919904
919901 and 919904 have common attributes.
600323 does not have any. It would be nice to say "Keine gemeinsamen Attribute".
This is well done for "Andere Attribute". See attached PDF.
item.summary: Vergleich form - keine gemeinsamen Attribute

comments.comment: Turned out to be a back end issue. Updated CompareListPageController.java to generate an empty list of common attributes, instead of a list of empty attributes, when the item doesn't share any attributes with other items in the comparison list. Checked in to the SVN (8958).
